item.title: Fabulous for Xamarin.Forms
item.description: Never write a ViewModel class again! Conquer the world with clean dynamic UIs! This library allows you to combine the power of functional programming and the simple Model-View-Update architecture to build any kind of mobile and desktop applications with an expressive, dynamic and clean UI DSL. Go cross-platform and target iOS, Android, Mac, WPF and more! Fabulous for Xamarin.Forms is build on Fabulous, which aims to provide all the tools to let you create your own mobile and desktop apps using only F# and the Model-View-Update architecture (shorten to MVU), with a great F# DSL for building dynamic UIs.
